directions: Dab 1/2 teaspoon whipped cream on each wafer.  Stack wafers together on a serving plate to make a log 14 inches long.  Frost log with remaining whipped cream.  Cover with plastic wrap and freeze 4 to 6 hours.  Let thaw in refrigerator for one hour.  To serve, slice at a 45 degree angle for the full zebra stripe effect.
title: Zebra Cake
